content.raw: Problems have reemerged for me as well.  Attempting to spawn an X1 now produces errors which would line up with what Ethan is experiencing as there is already an X1 trying to spawn.  I’ve even gotten as many as 4 unique clock times simultaneously publishing on /clock now.
content.html: Problems have reemerged for me as well. Attempting to spawn an X1 now produces errors which would line up with what Ethan is experiencing as there is already an X1 trying to spawn. I’ve even gotten as many as 4 unique clock times simultaneously publishing on /clock now.
